Call of Duty Ã‚Â®: Ghosts - a new part in a series of Call of Duty. 
Name of the game is associated with its main characters - an elite 
unit of ghosts, which is served when Goust or Lieutenant Simon Riley, 
an iconic character of the series, treacherously killed Shepard in the 
second part of the franchise. The game world is close to post-apocalypse 
that is new to the series. In the story, due to hacking the space station, 
"One", a hacker launched on major cities of America's nuclear missiles. 
The main characters - two brothers from California who meet with 
Ghosts and pouring into their team in order to maintain order 
in the new world.

Features:
Ten years after the devastating events of the U.S. border and global 
balance of power changed. In this harsh reality, the elite unit of 
fighters "Ghosts" to challenge the new global force, equipped with 
the latest technology and applying for world domination.
New universe Call of Duty: first time in the history of the series 
players will take part in the battle on the side of the weaker party, 
when the enemy is superior not only in the number of trunks, 
but also on technological equipment. Players will get acquainted 
with new characters and a whole new series Call of Duty Ã‚Â® locations.
